response.original_title: Children of WONDERS : Vidar's Little Adventure
response.overview: Prince Vidar Ragnar is sad. He's sad because his friends are leaving him. How could they!? He couldn't comprehend how they could just move on without any tears, how they could leave him. His heart is full of this inexplicable sorrow, which is pathetic for a Pyped like him. He needs to take his mind off of this whole business, so he does what he always wanted to....he goes on a little adventure!
response.title: Children of WONDERS : Vidar's Little Adventure
